runs.comm: on the money with this length delivery angling in on the batsman. Defended away to the leg side
gets this to slant in before straightening a touch as this is fended away on the front foot

delivers this one wide of the wicket as he steamed in, with the angle inviting Dwayne to have a go as he looked for the scythe through cover, but ends up missing it, with the ball continuing through to the keeper. There was a noise, but it was most likely bat hitting the ground as Mooney didn't seem very interested
has found a wonderful line as he delivers yet another one wide on the crease, with this one moving away upon pitching as Dwayne has another swish
this time the ball continues through on its natural angle as Dwayne, clearly remembering the last few deliveries, is not inclined to engage
fantastic maiden over from Mooney to get Ireland underway as he delivers another full delivery wide of the crease which bends away upon pitching, with Dwayne not able to make any contact
delivers this one across the burly left-hander as he chooses to leave it alone
this time slanting on a leg-stump line as Gayle fails to get any bat on this as the umpire calls a bye
short outside off which climbs appreciably as Gayle withdraws the blade
fails to glance this one honing in on the thigh guard as the ball rolls away to the off side after impact
squirts away this back of a length outside off through gully as it goes in the air temporarily, but falls safely after
content to just defend this one from the crease as the ball takes the outside edge to streak away through third man
slanting in on the left-hander as this is defended away
angles this in from wide of the crease as Dwayne is able to drill this past the bowler through long off
bowls a lovely length ball across him which Gayle plays inside the line of
full and on the pads as this is flicked away behind square
drags the length back on middle and leg, Gayle hangs back and taps it to the leg side
in the blockhole as Gayle digs this one out to get it down to long on
length on the pads which Gayle tries to whisk away off to the leg side
full on middle and off which is driven down to long off
fuller length going across as the keeper collects the take from behind
full on the middle and leg which is clubbed away to the leg side
overpitched as he got this one across Gayle, with the left-hander's eyes lighting up as he lifted this one high over deep extra-cover to bring up the first boundary of the morning
able to squirt this one away square off the wicket with a push to this back of a length going across
continues from wide on the crease as this time Smith is able to guide this through cow corner with a deft clip to this fuller length
Mooney back to his usual tactic as this one is drilled straight to long off
bends this one well away from this one angling in outside off, with Dwayne extending his arms through the shot to send this racing through cover
this time slants down the leg side as Dwayne fails to glance this away
shortish length outside off which is punched away towards the covers
fullish length now outside off which is sliced to the fielder at cover, who puts in a fine stop
short of a length on and around off which is fended away by Dwayne
this time straying on the hips as this is clipped away behind square
meets this fuller one angling in on the pads with the full face of the bat
easy as you like over mid-on with a chip that was struck nicely enough by Dwayne to get to the boundary
full again, this time on the pads, as this is flicked away efficiently through midwicket
full again on the toes as this is clipped to the fielder at midwicket
begins with a floater on off which is eased away to long on
goes round the wicket to Gayle as this one is turned away to the leg side
looking to entice a big Gayle drive, but the Jamaican is wise to the ploy
pushes at this one looping in from outside off, with the bowler fielding the ball after
lunges forward to meet the pitch of this one darted in
Gayle looking to be patient as he taps away McBrine through mid-on to end the over
welcome back to World Cup cricket, Kevin! ends up slipping one well down of wide as Kevin wishes he could so badly so back to 2011
this time turned away off the back foot, but with soft hands
gets away this back of a length on and around off, but finds the silly mid-on fielder

and the move has come off for Porterfield as Kevin pitches one up just outside off which Dwayne goes after as he lofts O'Brien straight into the clutches of long on, who takes it comfortably. Really a poor shot given the fielder in the deep
Gayle knows he has to settle things down as this length delivery is defended on the front foot
short of a length, going across, as this one ends up with the keeper
shorter one on middle which Gayle ducks under. Ends up being wided because of the height

gets a leading edge from this leg-stump line delivery that was just back of a length. This ends up squirting away to the point fielder, who runs to his left before collecting to throw down the striker's ends stumps, with Darren woefully short of his ground. Really ignominious way to go as he leaves without even facing a ball!
crunching drive through the covers to this one floated up just outside off
tried to force one through the covers again before mishitting this towards the leg side
rocks forward to cover for the turn
flighted in on middle and off as this is struck back to the bowler, who pounces on top of it
allowed room to get back and free his arms as he muscles this away through cover for four
lunges forward now to meet this one pushed through on and around off
nicely on top of this length delivery just outside off
defended by the batsman
short of a length and defended away to the leg side
full now outside off as this is struck straight to the close-in fielder on the leg side
short ball outside off which is punched away towards the covers. Gets Samuels off the mark as well
goes round the wicket now as this one is defended away off the back foot
what happened here? this seemed to slow up on him as he looked to play for the turn, with this one just passing by the outside of the blade
this time tucked away to the leg side, but straight to silly mid-on
nurdled away this time through midwicket as Samuels issues a firm call to his partner for the single
struck back at the bowler
excellent diving stop at mid-off cuts off a Gayle drive
that shot was never on as he looks to cut this away behind square, with him always succeeding in chopping it on
length on middle and leg which is eased down to long on
length on middle and off which is fended away by Samuels. Is keeping things nice and tight for Ireland at the moment
happy to just let this one though outside off to the keeper
slower ball which he sees early as he clubs this back over O'Brien's head to long off for four
brings down the blade to this one in and around off
fullish length on the stumps which is driven down to long off to end the over
fuller length on and around off which is turned to mid-on
looped in on middle as this is struck straight to Dockrell at cover
on the back foot as this is defended back towards the bowler
fullish length which is pushed down the ground to long on
flighted in on and around off as this is pushed through to the off side by Gayle
flighted in on middle and off as this is fended away by the batsman
length delivery angling in from round the wicket as Gayle meets the ball with a straight blade
fullish length angling away outside off as this is allowed to go through to the keeper
length on middle and leg now which ends up being hit back towards O'Brien
scythed away now through cover, but Dockrell puts a fine, diving stop. The ground fielding has been excellent so far from Ireland
this time trying to tuck O'Brien away through midwicket, but hits it a bit too straight to the fielder
turned away now off the hips as Gayle ambles down to the other end for a single
flighted in on middle as this one is driven back to the bowler
a touch shorter now as this is bunted away by Gayle
keeping it night and tight as there is simply no room to get this away
driven straight to the short mid-off fielder as Gayle exercises great patience
this time gets it past short mid-off to find long off as the West Indies fifty is brought up
punched back towards the bowler to end the over
begins over the wicket to Gayle as this one is struck back to him
looks to pad away this one pitched outside off and turning in
jabbed away off the back foot to find the man at long off
flighted in on middle and leg as this is tucked away through midwicket
this one seems to stop on Samuels as he checked his stroke to the leg side
backs away before playing this one back to the bowler
begins round the wicket to Gayle as this one is given respect by the batsman
shorter now as he is able to get it through Stirling on his follow through to find long off
blitzed away uppishly towards the cover fielder as this one just dies down before hitting him

plays down the wrong line of this one floated in outside off as the opportunity for a stumping may have gone begging as a fumbled chance from Gary Wilson allows Samuels to slide his foot back across the crease
cut away now as he rocks away to find extra-cover
slipping down leg as Gayle just wants the single as he tips this away through midwicket
fetches this one floated in from outside off before getting away a sweep which he is in no control of as this ends up at deep backward square
that is the Gayle we have all come to love and expect. Decides he has had enough of a look before slamming this fuller pitched ball over long on for a huge six
fails to needled this one away square off the wicket
opts for the paddle sweep, but finds square-leg
opens the face a touch as he defended this one from the crease
driven firmly to the man at mid-off to end the over
punched away off the back foot as he locates the cover fielder
short and wide and punished by Marlon as he is given the opportunity to free his arms, which he puts to good use, getting this away through point
this time content to ease this one down to deep extra-cover
Gayle content to just push at this one floated in to find long off
gets turn into the batsman from outside off as this is struck back to him
able to find the man at long off as they cross over for the single
defended back to the bowler off the back foot
able to steer this away through cover to get Gayle on strike
looks in no hurry as he eases another one down to long on
this time nurdled down off the back foot through the leg side
cut away  to point who has to run over to his left to field the ball
chopped away but locates the man at point
goes round the wicket as Gayle is given no room to work this away, hitting it back to Stirling in the end
this time driven down to long on as they both look to rotate the strike
tossed up just outside off as Marlon gets down the track before lofting the bowler high over long off for an 85-metre six
almost ends up holding out to cover as he gets away an uppish strike
tries to glide Stirling through backward point, but to no avail
gets a leading edge which squirts away to the off side
on the back foot as this is clubbed back towards the bowler

the pressure finally gets to Gayle as he looks to go big over cow corner, but doesn't quite get a hold of this one as he ends up finding the fielder before the rope, who takes a comfortable catch. Big, big breakthrough for Ireland, and Gayle has to go after his 36
darted in on middle and leg as this is fended to the leg side

Dockrell on fire at Nelson! Samuels is struck in line as he hangs on the back foot, with the umpire, after giving some thought, deciding he had to go. Samuels straight away reviews. Replays confirm that this was indeed hitting in line as he gets all three reds, so Samuels has to go. Big, big wicket for Ireland as Dockrell has not only picked up Gayle, but Samuels too as well
eases this away through the leg side to get off the mark as he is able to return for a brace
Decides Dockrell can't end this over without at least one boundary to his name as he clubs away the left-arm spinner over cow corner to find the rope after a couple of bounces
continues to operate a tight line outside off as this is defended to the off side
gets away a single square off the wicket
this time hits away in the direction of cover point
shortish outside off, Ramdin was looking to cut, but fails to connect as the keeper gloves it
on middle and leg this time, Ramdin wrists it away to the leg side
Dockrell now back over the wicket as he floats one in on off stump, which is defended by the batsman
darts in a quicker now on the same as Lendl turns this to the leg side

Ramdin plays all around this length delivery on and around off as he gets through the sweep too early, with this one crashing into the pads. The umpire doesn't hesitate to give this one out, and with no more reviews on offer, he has to go. West Indies in serious trouble as they wobble on 87 for 5

and he almost gets a fourth as this one, darted in outside off, catches the outside of his bat before rushing past the left hand of Stirling at slip. The ball is cut off before hitting the third man boundary
lovely flight as this one is hit into the ground by Lendl
once again safely negotiated to end a successful over for Ireland
darts in one on middle and off which is played back to him
manages to get away a single through square-leg
helps this one down to long on to get Sammy back on strike
pushes at this one to the right of the bowler, who is able to get to it in his follow through
another one darted in which all Sammy can do is strike back to the bowler
waits on it before meeting the pitch, getting this one behind square on the off side
lovely use of the feet to loft Dockrell high over long off as this just sailed over. Very elegant in his follow through
this time looks to use some finesses to get it past the slip, but no dice
defended on the front foot by the batsman
a bit quicker, and straight from Dockrell as this is defended back
ends the over with a bit of flight outside off which Sammy negotiates safely
tries to turn away McBrine behind square, but the close-in fielder in the area has something else to say
lunges forward to meet the pitch of this delivery
length on and around off which is turned away to the off side
squirts away this quicker one darted in just outside off as the West Indies 100 is finally brought up
Sammy content to just poke at this through the off side before setting off for quick single
driven firmly towards the cover fielder to end the over
slipping down the leg side as Sammy fails to get this away
this time is able to push away the delivery through the off side to get Lendl on strike
rocks forward to cover for any turn
backs away before punching this back to the bowler
Dockrell not giving away anything as Lendl can't get him away to the off side
tries to force one away down the leg side, but finds mid-on
elects to go with the tap-and-run outside off as they are able to cross ends
works with the angle to try and whisk this away through backward square
lunges forward, keeping the gap between bat and pad nice and tight
able to jab this away off the back foot, but finds mid-on
just can't seem to get this off the square at the moment as he chops this one into the ground
this time backs away a touch before jabbing down to long on for one
gets down the track before readjusting to defend in the end
gets deep in the crease before swatting this away through long on
eased away off the back foot as they exchange ends
fielder does well to get to this one which is pushed back in his follow through
turns this one away to the leg side, but can't steal a run
stays on the front foot to see out Dockrell's threat
keeps it straight as this is played back to him
giving nothing away as Sammy can't get him away
this time waits on the back foot to punch this away to deep extra-cover
driven straight to the short cover fielder
drilled down to long on by Sammy as he gets Lendl back on strike
sliced away through the off side as they cross for the run
short of a length outside off which is jabbed away towards mid-off, with Simmons running hard to make his ground at the other end
short again as this hits high on the splice of Sammy's bat as he is able to get it over the infield into cow corner
tucked away towards midwicket by the batsman
back of a length and negotiated easily by Sammy
Sammy reminds the Irish team of his threat as he slugs Sorensen over long on for another huge blow
full now, outside off, which is driven straight to extra-cover
eased away in front of square on the off side
shorter now as he tries to open the face to run this through gully
nurdled away on the leg side now as they scamper the single
pushed off the back foot, but straight to silly mid-on
a touch short as this one is driven away through the covers off the back foot
looks to back away before assuming his original stance to defend this one to the off side
short of a length and glanced away behind square, with Sammy wanting two from the get-go, but has a change of heart when he sees Dockrell charging in from the outfield
short enough for Lendl to hook through to deep backward square
tries to blaze one away on the up through cover, but picks the fielder instead
stroked away to the off side on a fuller length
back of a length and pushed through towards cover
short of a length outside off which is clubbed by Sammy over midwicket as he got enough elevation on it to beat said fielder before this continued on to the boundary
begins with one drifting onto leg as this is worked away behind square
cut away now through sweeper cover by the batsman
hangs on the back foot before trying to steer this one past backward point
opens the face a touch to try and run this past short third man, but to no avail
driven firmly, but straight to silly mid-on
short and width on offer as this is careened away off the back foot for four through backward point
darts in a quicker one on middle and off which is bunted away
places this one beautifully through extra-cover with a considered chip through the region, and with the fielders in the ring, it is safe as houses
guilty of slipping down leg now as the umpire gets a chance to stretch
carts away Dockrell through midwicket as Sammy berates himself for not quite getting all of that
defended by the batsman
this time Lendl is upset as his sweep round the corner fails to get past short backward square
tries to ease away the bowler behind square, but doesn't quite come off as he had planned
short of a length and angling down leg as this is tucked away through midwicket

manages to dig out this yorker on middle and leg with the ball continuing on through the leg side, with Sammy haring to the other end before putting in a dive. The fielder on the leg side fires in a throw at his end, but strikes Sammy in the back as he went down to make his ground
jabbed away off the back foot now towards the off side
short outside off which is ramped high over backward point, with the ball just carrying enough to get over the rope
punched away now on the off side
straying on a middle to leg-stump line as this is eased away off the back foot to the leg side
ends up chipping this one uppishly towards silly mid-off, with this one dying on the way to the fielder
tries to whip away the bowler down the leg side, with Wilson close to snagging the chance, but it went by him
rare bad delivery from Dockrell which is clipped away to deep backward square quite efficiently
picks his spot now at cow corner by carting Dockrell over the vacant area, getting enough on this to find the rope
looks to leave this one outside off in the hope of getting a wide, but doesn't come out that way
gets to this half-century with a glance away through the leg side as it comes at a very opportune time for the West Indies
fuller one just outside off which is defended away by Sammy
tries to ramp O'Brien over third man but is far too early in the stroke
slightly slower delivery in the same channel which Sammy gets behind comfortably
gets the line straighter as Sammy fails to ramp another one in the desired region. Wry smile on O'Brien's face as he watches the play-and-a-miss
this time gets it through to the boundary with a flashing blade, but he wasn't too far from the backward point fielder as this flew to his left
goes for the good ole tap-and-run outside his off stump to retain the strike
length delivery on and around off which is defended with a nice, straight bat
manages to deposit Sorensen high over the grassy banks at cow corner as another short ball is dismissed from his presence
waits on the back foot before punching this away to the off side
short of a length and pulled to midwicket by Sammy
down the leg side and penalised by umpire
opens the face to glide this one past the fly slip to the third man boundary
fuller one which is defended to the off side as Sorensen feigns a shy at the stumps which has Lendl losing his marbles as he gets back to his end, looking rather bewildered after

persists with the wide of the crease delivery line as this one angles across Sammy to his leg side, which he flicks effortlessly over short backward square, but limps as he walks over after. Is not looking very good here for him
able to check his shot before driving this fuller one towards the covers. Mooney, who was struggling a bit before, pulls up in his follow through as he rocks back and forth. Perhaps a calf issue?
short on the same channel as Lendl simply punches this away through the covers to find the rope. Brings up the 100-run stand between these two in the process. Good recovery from the West Indies

shortish length which is angling down leg as Mooney is bowling under-par with this niggle he has picked up. Lendl is furious as he picks out short backward square, when he should have got this past him to the boundary.
better line and length from Mooney as he endeavours to get through his over. This one is driven away towards long off
slows down the pace as Lendl is unable to work this away anywhere. That last delivery came in at 99.5 kph, so clearly struggling here
punches away this back of a length, but straight to the silly mid-off fielder
short of a length and carted over cow corner, with this one falling short of the fielder in the deep
gets this one wide of off as Sammy follows the angle, before deciding to leave it alone
crashed away through backward point as the fielder had no chance of getting a hand on it
now lasers this fullish length down the ground to long off for a single
tries to squirt one away square off the wicket, but finds the point fielder
fails to get this pull shot away as he gets a bottom-edge, with the ball continuing through to backward square
far too short and straddling down leg as this is paddled over to backward square
in the slot but ends up finding the man at long off after looking to go down the ground. Brings up the West Indies 200
driven back towards the bowler, who picks it up in his follow through
drifts it in on middle and off as this is driven firmly to the long off fielder
going down leg now as Sammy lets this one through
winds up before unleashing a powerful blow straight down the ground that makes it to the boundary in the very next instant
tries to run one down past the slip, but doesn't quite come off to plan
in the slot and heaved high and handsome over the straight boundary as he gets to his fifty. Playing his part beautifully
tries to run this one past the slip, but to no avail
length delivery which Lendl is able to get under as he smokes this one high over cow corner. Looking to shift into fourth, maybe fifth gear now
full now outside off and Lendl finds the boundary by slicing this one away through backward point. Ireland has to be careful here as to not undo their work from earlier in the innings
overpitched and Lendl just drives this on the up to deep extra-cover, who is able to stop it before the boundary
full again, outside off, as all Lendl has to do is get under it to needle this away through third man for four
short of a length and slanting down leg as this is pulled behind to deep backward square
gets this one going well down leg now with the angle from wide of the crease
length delivery angling on the pads as Sammy just bottom-hands this, almost shoveling it over his shoulder to find the deep backward square boundary

short and Sammy moves to his highest score with a club over deep square-leg as this one bursts through the hands of the fielder on the boundary's edge, before he fell away to his left to fall over, with the ball also going over. Mooney is not pleased, to say the least

and Sammy's search for that elusive ODI ton will have to wait for another day. Is not at all in control of this pull through midwicket, with this one coming off the top-edge before flying to the man in the deep, who takes the catch comfortably. The Nelson contingent rise to applaud a special knock
full and on off as this is driven away towards sweeper cover
waits on this slower ball before clipping away through mid-on
strays on the leg side as this is glanced away to the leg side
looks for the yorker as he ends up dishing a half-volley which is eased away to long on
digs a quicker one on the base of stumps which is negotiated by Lendl
looking for the yorker and this time offers up a low full toss which Lendl slams with the angle over long leg for six
flicks away this fuller length on the pads through midwicket
drilled straight to the fielder at cover to end the over
good length and down the leg side, Russell doesn't miss out and just helps it on its way along the ground to the fine leg boundary
drills the next delivery down to long on to get the single
slipping down the leg side as the umpire signals to the scorer
tries to force the issue on the off side, but finds the fielder

good slower ball which comes in from wide of the crease as Lendl is late on this, with this one striking the front pad after he failed to get any bat on it. Ireland appeal for lbw, but it is not given. They decide to pursue the review. Impact was in-line, but it shows that it was going to go on to miss the stumps. So unsuccessful review for Ireland there
advances down the track before checking his shot to push this delicately to the off side, with the pair able to scamper a single
loopy, slower ball which Lendl is unable to get away as he strikes this back to the bowler
short and wide as the batsman fails to do anything with this
width on a length which is carved away behind square to find the rope in a hurry
wide again outside off as Lendl's slash induces an outside edge which flies away safely to the third man boundary
is pretty much ready to throw the kitchen sink at everything as he goes for the short-arm pull now through midwicket
O'Brien is getting hammered in Nelson as this time Russell is given the opportunity to free his arms as he blazes this away through backward point
in the slot and Russell just slugs this over midwicket as this has enough on it to clear the rope. WI move to 280 now, something that may not have been fathomable even 20 overs back
continues from wide of the crease as the angle allows Lendl to get under this before slamming this high over cow corner to get into the 90s
too short from the bowler after Lendl tried to get bat on it
straddling down the pads as he tickles this one away on the leg side
shortish length which is pulled away rather rashly through the midwicket region
looks to hook this one over long leg before seeing the slow nature of the delivery, which allows him to readjust and pull this into the ground
works with the angle down the leg side to paddle this past the fielder at short backward square. Russell waits and waits before powering this past the man to the rope

got into position initially to scoop this over fine leg, before changing his stance at the last moment to heave this over cow corner, with the ball landing safely in the deep despite the two fielders approaching the ball near the boundary rope. Looked like a miscommunication there may have saved Russell as both men pulled out late
able to get Lendl back on strike as he carves a single through cover
full and outside off stump, driven along the ground to deep extra-cover
waits on the back foot before blitzing this away to the cover fielder

with a club through midwicket that makes it to the rope, Lendl becomes the fifth World Cup centurion of the tournament as the West Indies dressing room rises to applaud his sterling effort. Has really been a wonderful knock considering where West Indies were at one point

looking to slice high over cover, with Dockrell able to get under it to complete a forward, diving catch. Simmons trudges off the field, raising his blade to acknowledge the polite applause around Nelson. Has really done the trick for his team today
bowls a yorker right on middle which is dug out towards long on, who fumbles the initial take to allow for Russell to return back for the second
